titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Detroit records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Detroit records

archdesc.bioghist: Organization of alumnae of the University of Michigan's Martha Cook Building (residence hall for female students.)
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes; notebook detailing activities, 1945-1965; membership lists for classes of 1916-1956; and 75th anniversary material.
